titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Provost and Executive Vice-President for Academic Affairs (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.subordinate_name: Provost and Executive Vice-President for Academic Affairs

did.unittitle: Provost and Executive Vice-President for Academic Affairs (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: Central administrative unit which functions as chief executive assistant to the president, responsible for appointments and promotions with oversight for schools, colleges, educational units and programs; including budget planning, legislative relations, institutional research, and affirmative action policies.
archdesc.arrangement: Arranged into four subgroups: 1. Central files; 2. Staff files; 3. Supplemental files; 4. Publications.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence files of vice-presidents, associate and assistant vice-presidents, and other staff members within the vice-president's office.

College of Literature, Science, and the Arts
